body_html: @shlens: resize_image_with_crop_or_pad calls Check3DImage with required_static=True? Is there a reason for that? Fixing it would require changing a few routines to compute height and width via tf.shape at runtime rather that at graph construction time.
body_text: @shlens: resize_image_with_crop_or_pad calls Check3DImage with required_static=True?  Is there a reason for that?  Fixing it would require changing a few routines to compute height and width via tf.shape at runtime rather that at graph construction time.
body: @shlens: `resize_image_with_crop_or_pad` calls `Check3DImage` with `required_static=True`?  Is there a reason for that?  Fixing it would require changing a few routines to compute height and width via `tf.shape` at runtime rather that at graph construction time.
